And MMORPGs* is the best genre to capitalize oncommunity-based gameplay mechanics endemic to the metaverse.Deviant Series NFTsThese 10,000 characters NFTs called Deviants has Custom design & animation.Early access and hint of the game experience to come.. Orion’s Realm NFTsFive regions are divided into 5500 virtual land NFTs consisting of different types of terrain, where people can Construct structures. Activate meta sports events & competitions etc.  Sentinel Series NFTs A limited-edition 140 Smart NFTs with AI capabilities. Grants governance privileges.Transforms them into a "Councilor" of a specific region of the MetaRPG.  Economy and DAO The economy of Astra Nova consists of two tokens, Revive ($RVV) and G-Token ($GTKN). $RVV is an ERC-20 multi-utility token to serve multiple functions in the ecosystem. $GTKN is the governance token and G-Token holders will be part of the DAO of the future. The governance council comprises of Sentinels, Orion’s Realm NFT owners. G-Token holders will be the key decision-makers of the metaverse via their voting rights. They will help shape the evolution of the Astra Nova World. Interestingly, G-Token can only be earned through the metaverse and as staking rewards.
